name: Bedmonster
description:
[The game has been updated to version 2 (after the jam)]

Every night during the witching hour, strange things are happening in the kid's room. Lucky for the kid, the bed monster that lives under the bed has decided to help the kid out in order to survive the nights.

Objective

The game is a tower defense game. Place buildings in the room to defend yourself during the day and to stop the monsters that comes during the night.
Survive until the end to unlock a cool ending cutscene

Controls
WASD/Arrow keys - Move around
1/2 or N/M or Scroll wheel - Change current building
Space - Place buildings on the grid (if you can afford them)
